name: Sidewalk Helsing
description:
An action game made for the MiniJam #121 (https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-121-reflection)

The jam theme: Reflection

The jam limitation: Windows as a Mechanic

You are a vampire hunter armed with silver bullets. You must seek out the vampires from within a crowd of passers-by and dispatch of them before they slip away and wreak havoc. Your main way of spotting vampires would be from their lack of reflection, as can be seen in the windows of the buildings they walk next to.

Your mission is simple: take out the vampires, save the humans!

Controls:

Left Click - Shoot

I used some free assets for sounds and fonts.

Credits:

Have fun!
